Extent (file systems): Partial (only if the file fits into one contiguous block range)

Block suballocation: Partial (only inside of Stacker 3/Stacker 3 and Stacker 3 compressed volumesStacker 3)
Partial (only inside of Stacker 3/Stacker 3 and Stacker 3 compressed volumesStacker 3)

Copy on write: Yes, for Write once read many media
